忌.definition: to be jealous of; fear; dread; scruple; to avoid or abstain from; to quit; to give up sth

忌口.definition: abstain from certain food (as when ill); avoid certain foods; be on a diet

忌妒.definition: to be jealous of; to envy

忌憚.definition: to be afraid of the consequences; restraining fear

忌日.definition: anniversary of a death; inauspicious day

忌諱.definition: taboo; to avoid as taboo; to abstain from
